EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Action Required Today for New Online Ordering Features
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Tomorrow is the big day! As an Aloha Online Ordering user, you’re being migrated to our new Digital Ordering platform on July 14, 2021 during regular maintenance hours, so there’s no impact to your service. From building your brand to making your operations more efficient, you’ll get plenty of new features, including: - Brand and menu customization – Add your colors and fonts in seconds and upload images of your dishes to showcase your culinary creations. - Offer delivery and own your customer – Integrate your online ordering with Drive powered by DoorDash and keep your customers ordering through your digital channel. - Responsive design – Guests get the same experience whether they’re placing orders on their phone, a tablet, or a computer. Let’s get ready to roll! It all starts with your new Digital Ordering experience on July 14, 2021. Your site will have a fresh look and we can’t blame you for being excited to setup your new login <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rc3/ek/va/Digital Ordering Migration Instructions.pdf]]> right away. Don’t forget to watch the training videos so you’re all set and ready to go with the new Digital Ordering site starting on Day 1. Have questions?
